website_summaries.verdict: This is a nutrient-rich dog food made with quality ingredients; but you may have to pay close attention to portion sizes to for optimal weight loss.
pros: A limited-ingredient recipe that doesn't contain wheat, corn, soy, or by-products
Blended with quality protein, fruits, vegetables, and whole grains
Comes in small and large dog kibble, and several bag sizes
cons: Not all dogs lost weight after eating it, and some gained weight
A few reports of stomach upset

customer_reviews.title: Best Weight Product without a prescription.
customer_reviews.text: The BEST weight product for my dog. I have tried all other products that aren't physician Ordered (aka - expensive). This is the best. Keeps him happy, great price and actually keeps him from gaining weight. He did trim down a little bit but most importantly, he's not getting fatter. His poop was very light colored for about three weeks after switching to the product but has since returned to a more normal color.
customer_reviews.author: DStooks

customer_reviews.title: ... had bladder issues in the past and gains weight easily. We've tried prescription dog food
customer_reviews.text: My dog has had bladder issues in the past and gains weight easily. We've tried prescription dog food, and a ton of other kinds of "natural" dog foods. This stuff works well to keep him from gaining weight (and it gives him a larger portion than some other weight management foods) and his bladder problems have eased up.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Charles

customer_reviews.title: Fast Delivery.  All of Our  Dogs Love It.  Helped my dog get to a health weight.
customer_reviews.text: We raised our English Setter (13) on Nutro Food. We have four dogs. We have a Golden Retriever who is over weight. After a bag of this food, he is now at his appropriate healthy weight. We feed him twice a day and feed kibble as treats as well. The other dogs love this food as well, we use it as treats. This was delivered quickly. Appeared very fresh. I highly recommend. I paid full price for this food and was not compensated in any way for this review.
customer_reviews.author: Sean B. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Not good for my boy
customer_reviews.text: After feeding this food to my dog, he started not wanting to move, I had to drag him to get him to go outside to even potty, I honestly thought my dog was on his way to dying! Then I read where this brand was 1 of 16 brands associated with heart issues! I changed his food yesterday, and he is starting to act like himself again
customer_reviews.author: Debi Rose

customer_reviews.title: This works
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this food and has lost weight eating it. I was using another weight management product without much success and decided to try this. Made in the good ole USA with wonderful ingredients for your dog. Grain free too. Chicken, Lamb, and Salmon are the proteins used in addition to veggies and important vitamins. A good choice for my Min Pin.
customer_reviews.author: Lois Langston

customer_reviews.title: Something is wrong
customer_reviews.text: This seems like a really good dog food, however, both of my dogs threw up after eating it. I thought maybe it was a fluke, but it happened a number of times and then they stopped eating it. Switched back to their previous food and they stopped throwing up. Can't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Paul W

customer_reviews.title: Kibble looks different (dry) and caused my dogs digestive issues
customer_reviews.text: The kibble looks different than other bags of the same food. Seems to have caused stomach upset in both dogs.
customer_reviews.author: T.L.

customer_reviews.title: Lulu Loves It
customer_reviews.text: Lulu has a heart murmur and has been getting a little "chunky" for the vet's approval. She has never eaten dry food, but I decided to try this Weight Management Nutro and she loves it -- she hoovers it down faster than what I had been giving her. I feed her a smaller portion than indicated on the bag (according to the vet's instructions) and top it with shredded green beans to give her more fiber and bulk. In one month she has lost one pound and the vet is happy. If this regimen helps her live longer, we will all be thrilled around here. She is a very sweet 12-yr. old Bichon and loved by all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Diarrhea developed because of the food.
customer_reviews.text: I thought this product was high quality, but my dog developed diarrhea/loose stool immediately I switched to this product. She cannot hold her poops during day which she has never had problem of. Even though this is a weight management dog food, it's not good at all if a dog looses weight because of diarrhea. I will never recommend this to other dog owners. I want a refund!!!
customer_reviews.author: fh

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves it and it improved his gland issues
customer_reviews.text: We were looking for a new healthy kibble with lots of fiber for our 6 year old 13 LB shih-poo cuz he has issues with his anal glands getting backed up :( Through some online research we found this food and we are also are giving him Glandex treats (just a tip for those who’s dogs have the same anal gland issue). Our dog eats this food more than he was eating his previous food and the kibble is smaller and easier for him to eat. We have also seen a huge change in his anal gland issues since his stool is harder and more frequent now yay!! Will be ordering again when this bag is done.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Fox

customer_reviews.title: Dog Approved and Owner Happy
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this brand. He was gaining weight because I was giving him too many treats. My doggy care professional suggested the Ultra Weight Management Dry Dog Food which she gives her very healthy dog. Now, I have changed his treats to carrots and apple pieces. He is on his way to becomming a very healthy dog and has lost six pounds from his 39 pounds in two months and we will continue this regimen until he is down to 25 pounds. Once he is down to the desired weight, I will re-institute a few healthy dog treats and no more crackers and cheese when I have it, but will always keep using the Ultra small breed weight management.
customer_reviews.author: Guay Chatfield

customer_reviews.title: Great for weight control
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this food. And I found it far less costly than specialty organic options. He lost weight (a good thing) on this, because it has fewer calories per cup than other diet kibble. My dog has environmental allergies but not food allergies. This did not create any issues for either. He is a golden retriever, so we didn’t want grain-free (high incidence of heart issues for Golden’s who est a grain free diet). Quite happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: NKL

customer_reviews.title: Good Grain Product
customer_reviews.text: Our Vet recommended switching our Golden Retriever to a Grain Diet for Senior dogs due to her age and the recent concerns and FDA investigation to grain-free diets possible link to cardiac issues with large dogs. This was not an easy decision as every article promotes grain-free, but after reviewing several product labels and calories per cup felt this was one of the most reasonable offerings balancing quality product and price. Upon Vet approval we gave this a try. Our gal loves it! We did the 12 day switch and she has had no issues in adjusting to her new diet.
customer_reviews.author: Maddie's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great for Weight Management!
customer_reviews.text: Our Golden mix needed to lose about 10 pounds. We had tried other foods to no avail. This food was recommended by our friend and our dog loves it! The vet provided the appropriate caloric intake for our dog’s size. We included treats in that count as well. It took about a year, but she is now at her optimal weight. We also go for a mile walk a few times a week. We now have increased her intake to 600 calories per day based on our vet’s recommendation.
customer_reviews.author: M. Repko

customer_reviews.title: Great food for my Golden
customer_reviews.text: My dog is a happy camper. I have been feeding this to her (Golden Retriever) for five years since the vet recommended that we change foods because of yeast build up in the ears. Since we started her on this the yeast build up have gone. She maintains the same weight and now that she is 8 years old, both of us do not run and jump so much anymore, although, I think that she would like too.
customer_reviews.author: es

customer_reviews.title: absolutely the best dog food out there
customer_reviews.text: I have raised 7 dogs on Nutro dry dog food . no matter what breed nor age of my dogs they thrive on nutro . not nearly as pricey as some . read the ingredients .!! I will continue to use Nutro dry dog food for years to come. Kudos to Nutro !
customer_reviews.author: barbara d.

customer_reviews.title: Good Natural Ingredients
customer_reviews.text: My pomeranian-poodle doesn't like this food as much as the other Nutro kibble. But the ingredients are natural and high quality, and I love that. The bag opens and seals close easily, unlike many other dog food bags. The kibble is small and crunchy. I believe other dogs will love this.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Skyes♡Top Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: Bags kicked around like a soccer ball
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed by amazon. I’ve been on subscribe and save for this food for years and recently it looks like they are just throwing the bags of food around so much so it is crushing the product. This is the 3rd month of this quality and has made my dog have digestive issues. Not to mention the mess it leaves with crushed food all over the place. Needless to say I am cancelling my subscription because they can’t keep the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: MADE IN THE USA!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Best quality dog food in my opinion. I have 4 poms and a yorkie and they all love it. My friends and family who switched their furbabies to Nutro Ultra say their dogs love it too. Coats are shiny and all are very healthy. My yorkie was overweight and when I switched him from regular small breed version to small breed weight management version, he lost the weight and is keeping it off. My vet was impressed....especially since nothing else changed about his lifestyle other than the food. My grandmother's pom also lost her weight and is in perfect health. Great product, made in the USA too!! Highly recommend!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Fee8971

customer_reviews.title: Great Food for Keeping the LBS Off of the Beasties
customer_reviews.text: I have a handicapped Mini-Aussie who has neurological issues with her lower spine... so keeping her weight down is important as she is a little Piggie and would keep eating if she could. I have been feeding her Nutro Ultra for many years. I trust the brand and I have seen great results with her weight being managed by portions that keep her happy. I like the fact that these are ingredients I can confidently feed my dog.
customer_reviews.author: Cloudy in Seattle

customer_reviews.title: Keep weight and healthy. I guess it tastes great!
customer_reviews.text: My dog ​​is 8 years old, golden retriever. He has been eating this brand for a long time, healthy and extremely smart. He always maintains a good appetite and does not gain weight. I will also feed it some fruit and chicken to balance nutrition. I have a soft spot for the dog food because it can keep my dog weight not up!
customer_reviews.author: Amazing

customer_reviews.title: Healthy trustable quality food for little dogs
customer_reviews.text: My pom has been eating this food for her whole adult life and she is picky. I only give her dry food. she eats food slowly but finishs her food. I love the ingredients. I have never had any trouble getting food or having my dog become sick from food. she gets excited every time here box from amazon shows up from amazon. Its a high quality food which is not overly expensive. I have studied a lot about little dog food and Nutro Ultra is always on top with pricey brand. great all around food I highly Recommend it. Please feel free to ask any questions
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: My Dog Loves this
customer_reviews.text: For the first year I had him, I threw away more dog food, both wet and dry. I finally bought some Fresh Pet and this brand of dog food and he's a happy camper. Eats up his meals now. He's a rescue and not very big (15 lbs) but he drove me crazy the first year. I was buying this at Petsmart and one day I decided to look it up on Amazon and voila, the same brand for less.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Switched my dog over to this against my better judgement. She’s a little on the chunky side ...
customer_reviews.text: Switched my dog over to this against my better judgement. She’s a little on the chunky side and needs to drop a pound or two. She gained almost a pound on this food and became more lethargic.
customer_reviews.author: Runner Girl

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves this food!
customer_reviews.text: We have a small Shih Tzu and she needs to watch her calorie intake. This food is perfect for her! She not only loves it, even as a treat but has also kept her girl figure in check.
customer_reviews.author: TJmom

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, but a Tad Pricey
customer_reviews.text: Signing up for the Autoship makes getting dog food no longer a chore and for that I am thankful,. but this seems to be a bit pricey. Flavor is great because my dog is always eager when food time comes.
customer_reviews.author: Blake E.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product for my Small Dog
customer_reviews.text: My small dogs likes this food better than the others we have tried for weight management. It seems to fill her up with less food. It's a very small kibble, so it's easy for her to chew.
customer_reviews.author: OuOkie

customer_reviews.title: They have lost a few pounds and are happy and active
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping. Thanks! My Bichon Frise are extremely picky eaters. They are 8+ years old and slightly overweight. We tried 20+ foods and this is the only brand they will eat. The recently came out with this weight management small breed and the pups don't seem to notice a difference from the regular small breed formula. They have lost a few pounds and are happy and active.
customer_reviews.author: P P Metts

customer_reviews.title: This really worked to cut my dogs weight. I ...
customer_reviews.text: This really worked to cut my dogs weight. I have a hiweenie who is both Long and short, this really helped him cut some much needed weight and he didn’t skip a beat from the regular calorie in the same flavor to this.
customer_reviews.author: Alison Fell

customer_reviews.title: Ehhhhh
customer_reviews.text: This Product Did Help My Dog Lose Weight. It Did Help Her Digest Food Quicker. But, After A Couple Of Weeks My Dog Got Horrible diarrhea And She Threw Up Multiple Times. This Lasted About 72 Hours.
customer_reviews.author: maryy gooo

customer_reviews.title: Feed the amounts recommend, they will loose weight.
customer_reviews.text: Nutra Ultra is all we've ever used to feed our 4 year old mini Schnauzer and 5 year old mini Yorkie, they love it. If you use as directed they will loose weight. We do spray with water bottle to moisten, our Yorkie swallow without chewing.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Knox

customer_reviews.title: My Dog Woofs This!
customer_reviews.text: Having never eaten it myself, as far as taste goes, I can only attest to my dog's high recommendation of this food! I feel that the ingredients are better than most, however, certain items (fillers/beet) are not to my liking. Value? It's not a bargain, but my boy is worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Terry R. K.

customer_reviews.title: Great product. My dog has been eating Nutro Ultra ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. My dog has been eating Nutro Ultra since she was old enough to eat dry food. She's 4 now. There's a formula for every stage of life. It was originally recommended to me by her. Vet because she was very sick when I first got her at 6 weeks of age. I noticed a significant difference in her overall health and coat when I started feeding her the Nutro. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: That's So Ace

customer_reviews.title: Small niblets
customer_reviews.text: Small pieces for smaller dogs. easy for dogs to chew. My dog was not thrilled with the food by itself. I make home made dog food. (chicken with rice) and used the Nutro to add to the home made food. That made a big difference.
customer_reviews.author: jody

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves this stuff and the price is great
customer_reviews.text: This has been the only dog food I buy for about 13 years. The price was great. Subscription options even better. Came packed well in a large box (except they left the box directly in front of my door and I couldn't get out. That was a bit funny. I REALLY enjoy NOT having to go to the store and lug a heavy bag around
customer_reviews.author: Hartle

customer_reviews.title: My dog likes it!
customer_reviews.text: My dog likes this food which is why I buy it. It also helps her maintain her weight. I can’t say much for the flavor since she can’t tell me but it must be good.😃
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: We have 2 9 yr old papillion puppies. They have eaten this brand of dog food always. By switching to weight management, I can fill a bowl and not worry about weight gain for them. Their vet is very pleased with their health and vitality and they each have maintained perfectly for years now. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: laurie N.

customer_reviews.title: Quality Food
customer_reviews.text: So far we are on week 2 with this food and my dog already feels less bloated. My dog had no issues transitioning he normally does. He enjoys it and I must say it actually smells good, the size is also something I liked not too large not too small. The ingredients are so much more natural and definitely worth the price. Def would recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Danya R.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent food option
customer_reviews.text: Excellent formula and healthy option without extra unnecessary calories for our fur babies! I've done comparison and this is a premium food choice for a very reasonable price on Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: This works!
customer_reviews.text: My picky little yorkie loves this food! She's only 5 pounds and gets frustrated when eating the larger bites of food, it's just a lot of work for her. The tiny pieces are very manageable for her and she seems to like the taste. The transition was easy, I started by adding about 1/3 of this to her food portion for a couple days, then 2/3 for a couple days, then just this. No sick tummy.
customer_reviews.author: annawashere

customer_reviews.title: It works, and it's reasonably priced!
customer_reviews.text: I myself can't comment much on the flavor, but my dog sure likes it. She eats enough to be satisfied but is losing weight slowly but surely! Plus, it's not as expensive as some of those crazy fancy foods.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Carrigan

customer_reviews.title: He seems to be doing better overall with his stomach issues and is back on ...
customer_reviews.text: My senior dog loves this food! He seems to be doing better overall with his stomach issues and is back on a regular poop schedule again :) Smells good and relatively inexpensive compared to other high quality foods.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Great Nutrition and it Works!
customer_reviews.text: My best friend loves it and it's working to help keep his weight in line. Have been using it for a long time and have gotten friends to switch over as well after finding their dog likes it better too. My little guy really looks forward to his meal. The only problem is that he INHALES his meals now. Also, Buster is only 12 lbs, but the regular sized kibble is fine for him. No need to pay more for the small breed kibble unless you just want to.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: OK BUT NOT FOR MY DOGS
customer_reviews.text: Looks like a good product but neither of my dogs want to eat it. I have one that needs to lose weight so now I'm cooking for her!
customer_reviews.author: G Harris

customer_reviews.title: Made my dogs sick
customer_reviews.text: BUYER BEWARE!!! This food made my dogs so sick. It caused them to throw up yellow bile almost every other day and turned their poop a yellowish color. Once I realized it was the food making them sick I switched back to their prior brand of nutro and their eating and poop quickly improved. Stay away!
customer_reviews.author: pomchimom

customer_reviews.title: Chunky Cavalier who is a senior and her idea of ...
customer_reviews.text: Chunky Cavalier who is a senior and her idea of exercise is going up and down the foam stairs to the bed lost her excess weight. She took to it right away.
customer_reviews.author: PAL

customer_reviews.title: Great for small dogs!
customer_reviews.text: Dogs love it! I have 2 small poodles. I wet food with water and they enjoy it. I like the ingredients as well.
customer_reviews.author: SDD610

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed... usually by this from Percocet or Chewy. Thought I would try Amazon. One third of the bag are crumbs. So upset!!
customer_reviews.author: A. Bergman

customer_reviews.title: Allergic
customer_reviews.text: My dog is allergic to this food. His skin became itchy after switching to the weight control formula. He went to the vet, who gave him anti itch medication and recommended that he switch to a different type of food. So that is what I will do.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer B

customer_reviews.title: Good food that is not grain free which is now shown to be detrimental.
customer_reviews.text: Well, since this is dog food I'm obviously doing this vicariously because I draw the line at actually tasting their food. They clearly like it and it is NOT GRAIN FREE which has now been linked to cardio myopathy...so all of you doing the grain free are going to regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Read to learn

customer_reviews.title: Approved by our dog!
customer_reviews.text: Vet recommended to assist our Australian Shepherd in losing weight. Not sure if it's working yet but our dog enjoys it very much.
customer_reviews.author: Stella

customer_reviews.title: Great for coat and weight management
customer_reviews.text: Only food my GSD with sensitive stomach would tolerate. Her coat went from dull, dry yellow when we rescued her to a silky red. The formula helps to maintain her weight where the vet wants her. Price is exactly the same as the other well known pet shipping service
customer_reviews.author: EMT2RN

customer_reviews.title: Allergy to chicken
customer_reviews.text: My dog is allergic to chicken products & cannot eat this so I cancelled this product
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Whitson

customer_reviews.title: My dog love it
customer_reviews.text: I been feeding my long hair dachshund for years she love it and she is very healthy
customer_reviews.author: Brow

customer_reviews.title: Performs as well as more expensive brands
customer_reviews.text: My dogs are responding well to it. They’re down to their ideal weight, have stopped itching and love the flavor
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great food
customer_reviews.text: I giving it a couple of more weeks to see if my dog will lose weight on it. I've used it before with good results. We'll see. If not I will try the actual diet food they have(did not know they had it when I ordered this one)
customer_reviews.author: Cathy J. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Helps us feel like we're making healthy choices for our dog
customer_reviews.text: Quality ingredients. Helps us feel like we're making healthy choices for our dog. Haven't noticed any weight loss compared to other Nutro dog foods of the same amount. We're probably still over feeding, though. We have a miniature schnauzer. Kibble size is plenty small enough for her.
customer_reviews.author: happyhikingdad

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love this food
customer_reviews.text: I don't eat it, but my dogs love it. However, they haven't trimmed down any, and I feed half of what is suggested. They have not gained any either. I have prime, so it's free shipping, and 12$ less than pet shop and it's grain free with excellent ingredients. They have shiny coats, loads if energy. And eat every kibbel
customer_reviews.author: horseshowmom

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves
customer_reviews.text: My dog is getting old and she needed to loose some weight. I tried this and she loves the food and she’s loosing weight!!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Baker

customer_reviews.title: Low in calories
customer_reviews.text: Can’t really say what the flavor is because I don’t eat it but my dog does and likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Dog approached, helps with weight
customer_reviews.text: Took my dogs tummy a few days to get used to the change in food but she loves the flavor and I think it is working at dropping her weight a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Traci G

customer_reviews.title: Love this dog food
customer_reviews.text: Love this dog food! I have one dog that is overweight & one dog with a sensitive stomach. This food works for both of my fur babies. Highly recommend Nutro Ultra
customer_reviews.author: Judy DeFord

customer_reviews.title: Happy Pup!
customer_reviews.text: My 3yr old black lab mix had been on Nutro his entire life up until about six months ago when I put him on a competitors new food. That was a HUGE mistake. His coat was dull, dry and flaky skin, and started having ear issues. Within a week of being back on Nutro Ultra, his skin is 100% better.
customer_reviews.author: CMHWolf

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I have a doxin spaniel and she loves this. She was a bit overweight, but has slimmed down since I switched to this. It's great quality and helps keep her fur soft. Everyone that pets her comments at how soft her fur is.
customer_reviews.author: Wesley J.

customer_reviews.title: The only food my dogs will eat.
customer_reviews.text: My 2 poms love this. It says for weight management which is why I purchased for my overweight pom. They've been eating this for about 8 months but she hasn't lost weight.
customer_reviews.author: mclem8878

customer_reviews.title: The price is good.
customer_reviews.text: My dog likes it. Love the resealable bag. Keep the food fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey C

customer_reviews.title: spoiled item?
customer_reviews.text: I have always been buying this product for my dog, but the latest shipment is somehow different. My dog doesn't want to eat, is turning away from it, and when he does eat it, he is throwing up after. Something is defective.
customer_reviews.author: LauraM

customer_reviews.title: It's healthy food.
customer_reviews.text: My dog liked it. I was looking for a good quality food for her. She is okay with ultra.

customer_reviews.title: Recommended by the vet
customer_reviews.text: Recommended by the vet, Nurtro is all natural ingredients with no cheap fillers. My dog loves it and it helps him stay healthy.

customer_reviews.text: I think my dogs love this verson of Nutro's Dry Dog Food! I was looking for one a bit less on calories or in a good mix of nutrition, and I am still evaluating the performance and my dog's reaction or weight changes with this diet. So far, so good!
customer_reviews.author: JoyS

customer_reviews.title: Our dog loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a purina pro lover, but this is a great weight management food. Easy transition from our dogs Purina Pro to this. He loves it.

customer_reviews.title: No complaints from the dogs.
customer_reviews.text: I gave it five stars for flavor, but to be completely honest I don’t usually eat kibble. My dogs seem happy with it, but to be fair they do eat tree bark. Arf Arf 🐶
customer_reviews.author: Jeff J.

customer_reviews.title: The BEST. My Rottie has no tolerance for the dog ...
customer_reviews.text: The BEST. My Rottie has no tolerance for the dog food at the grocery stores. In order for him to stay trim he needs to be on a weight management type of food. He isn't to picky about taste (loves anything he can chew ;-) ). A little expensive but he's worth every cent! This dog food satisfies all of Kratos' needs!!
customer_reviews.author: AFCALGAL

customer_reviews.title: wanting to go outside and eat grass all evening long or too much gas in my Great Dane. Have also left a complaint with the ...
customer_reviews.text: Been buying this dog food for a couple years. lately its making my dogs sick. Usually every couple of bags makes my dogs have a little upset stomach, wanting to go outside and eat grass all evening long or too much gas in my Great Dane. Have also left a complaint with the Nutro company.
customer_reviews.author: Elena Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Good food
customer_reviews.text: My boxer lab mix likes eating this. Then again it's her only food so she has no choice. Slimming down a bit from her weight over this past year. She has her puppy stamina and speed back. Also more agility.
customer_reviews.author: Eric B.

customer_reviews.title: My Dogs love this food
customer_reviews.text: My Dogs love this food. Highly suggest this. The bowel movements that the dogs have is minimal and its obvious that its a good food that they are eating.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Good option for weight management.
customer_reviews.text: My Maltese has bulked up to 5 lbs. now, and she is going on a diet! So far she hasn't complained about the switch to the weight management version of her food. I'm hoping she can get back down to her previous trim 4 lb. self without too much fuss.
customer_reviews.author: P. Godorov

customer_reviews.title: Dog loved the flavor but she is not a pickey eater
customer_reviews.text: Dog ate it no problem. Other dog who is picky eater was interested in it. Put into feeding rotation with other foods.
customer_reviews.author: LillyFlower

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Always arrived on time, price is fair and good quality
customer_reviews.author: Ally Hollingsworth

customer_reviews.title: Good kibble for the price
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size kibble for small dogs. My 3 Doxies loved the taste and each lost about a pound over 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Lynne Dixon

customer_reviews.title: Nutro ULTRA Small Breed Weight Management Dry Dog Food
customer_reviews.text: This is the kind of food that my dog loves and needs to stay healthy. My dog loves it and that makes me very happy and the price is right!
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Diamond

customer_reviews.title: Our German Shepherd and Yellow Lab appear to love it because they clean out their bowls
customer_reviews.text: Our German Shepherd and Yellow Lab appear to love it because they clean out their bowls. Took them a little while to accept the Weight Mgt versus regular Nutro Ultra but they eat it twice a day now with no problem. The weight management and a little exercise appear to help them maintain and even lose a little weight which was to goal.
customer_reviews.author: F. Steven Parrish

customer_reviews.title: Great for underactive dogs!
customer_reviews.text: Seriously can't thank this product and brand enough! Charlotte has the most sensitive stomach, and we've had no issues since switching, also, she's lost 10 pounds and is now at a healthy weight.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Cast

customer_reviews.title: Healthy food in small bites for tiny mouths
customer_reviews.text: Health food for my puppy with tiny pieces for her small mouth. Easy for her to chew. Does not contain Legumes .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes my dogs throw up!
customer_reviews.text: My 2 small dogs have been eating this food for a couple of weeks. Both are throwing up, and never have with any other food. I wanted to help my dogs lose a little weight, but there is something wrong with this food. I just wasted a lot of money on this food, can’t recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Rambo

customer_reviews.title: Dog won't eat it
customer_reviews.text: My dog won't eat it. Too crunchy and hard. Not good for small dogs.
customer_reviews.author: PKDobbs

customer_reviews.title: Very good food
customer_reviews.text: My little Yorkie has been on the food for 12 Years!
customer_reviews.author: Love my golden!

customer_reviews.title: Great food my big dog really liked it
customer_reviews.text: Great food my big dog really liked it. Nice to have it delivered rather than haul it around myself. Bet I drove the neighbors crazy wondering what the big box was! Ha!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ultra by Nutro, my pugs’ superfood!!
customer_reviews.text: Super food for my pugs. They love it and it’s good for them.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Houston

customer_reviews.title: Quality Food
customer_reviews.text: This is a great weight managment food. I've been using it the past 2 years and it works.
customer_reviews.author: CL

customer_reviews.title: My pet loves the dry dog food. Looking forward ...
customer_reviews.text: My pet loves the dry dog food. Looking forward to see how well it helps her coat. This is the first time I have given this product to my pet.
customer_reviews.author: happy customer

customer_reviews.title: older medium size dogs and they love the food
customer_reviews.text: older medium size dogs and they love the food. good nutricion for them. one of them has alergies to poultry and the food helps her.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos G.

customer_reviews.title: Refused to Eat
customer_reviews.text: My dog did not like it; she refused to eat. I hoped that she would come around, but that didn't happen.
customer_reviews.author: lisa jones

customer_reviews.title: My dog likes it just fine
customer_reviews.text: My dog isn't losing any weight, but he does like this food and it's ingredients are high quality. Give it a try; your dog will like it.
customer_reviews.author: BookGirl54

customer_reviews.title: Great dog food!
customer_reviews.text: This formula replaced the one I've fed my dogs for the last 20 years. I was very upset at first but my dogs are doing great on this formula and they love it.
customer_reviews.author: Woollduck

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My pouch has been on this brand since leaving puppy food. She poops less and is a healthy 9 year old. So glad I started ordering from Amazon. Cheaper than the stir and comes to my front door.
customer_reviews.author: susan williams

customer_reviews.title: Weight loss
customer_reviews.text: My doggy loves it and it helped her lose weight.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: No Complaints
customer_reviews.text: We really like Ultra Weight Management for our aging lab. We started her on this food when she was 12. It's been two years and she's doing great. It keeps her weight in check, she likes it, and it seems to make clean-up a bit easier, too.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith W

customer_reviews.title: Dogs weren’t thrilled.
customer_reviews.text: I had to add flavorings such as beef broth to get my dogs to eat this food.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Black

customer_reviews.title: Chihuahuas love it!
customer_reviews.text: My chihuahuas love this and it seems to be helping the chunky one to lose a little weight. The other one seems to be staying at his healthier weight. I think grain free is the way to go.
customer_reviews.author: Luvy Bear

product_meta.title: Nutro Ultra Weight Management Adult Dry Dog Food
product_meta.description: Style:Adult| Size:30 lb.NUTRO ULTRA believes that dogs deserve to enjoy their food as much as we enjoy ours. And like us, they shouldn’t have to compromise on taste. Every NUTRO ULTRA The Superfood Plate recipe is crafted using quality ingredients that satisfy and nourish. These delicious recipes start with real chicken as the #1 ingredient and feature a trio of high-quality protein from chicken, lamb, and salmon and a blend of 15 vibrant superfoods like coconut, chia, kale, and blueberries. NUTRO ULTRA Adult Weight Management Recipe provides a balanced diet for adult dogs that’s nutrient rich and full of flavor that’ll help your dog thrive. Bring together unique ingredients and flavors to make your pet’s mealtime an extraordinary moment with NUTRO ULTRA Dog Food. All NUTRO ULTRA Dry Dog Foods follow the NUTRO FEED CLEAN philosophy, using high-quality ingredients sourced from trusted farmers and suppliers. These dry recipes are made with Non-GMO ingredients† and have no chicken by-product meal, corn, wheat, or soy protein and no artificial flavors, colors, or preservatives. Plus, these nutrient rich recipes are full of flavor and have high-quality protein as the foundation of every recipe. † Trace amounts of genetically modified material may be present due to potential cross-contact during manufacturing.
feature_bullets: Contains One (1) 30 Lb. Bag Of Nutro Ultra Adult Weight Management Dry Dog Food With A Trio Of Proteins From Chicken, Lamb And Salmon (New Look, Same Product – Packaging May Vary)
Features Trio Of Protein From Chicken, Lamb, And Salmon—Chicken Is The #1 Ingredient—Specially Formulated For Overweight Adult Dogs To Help With Healthy Weight Management
Our Premium Dog Food Kibble Is Made With High-Quality Ingredients And Provides Complete And Balanced Nutrition For Adult Dogs In Every Bowl
Nutro Ultra Dry Dog Food Is Made With High-Quality Protein And Our Blend Of 15 Vibrant Superfoods, Like Coconut, Chia, Kale, Blueberries, And Other Quality Ingredients
Made With No Chicken By-Product Meal, Corn, Soy, Or Wheat, And No Artificial Flavors, Colors, Or Preservatives
